title: Analytics Dashboard
summary: Realtime charts, role-based access, and integrations.

body.raw:
## Overview
I built a performant dashboard with realtime metrics, row-level security, and a modular widget system.

- Server components for data-heavy views
- Streaming and Suspense for fast TTFB
- Framer Motion for micro-interactions

## Outcomes
- 1.7s â†’ 0.9s LCP
- 30% time-on-page increase

title: Schuster Landing Page
summary: Landing page for a small business owner with the help of lovable.dev

body.raw:
## Overview
I built a nice landing page for a small business owner


## Outcomes
- Nice Landing page
body.code:
